# Required API files configuration
# One relative API path per line (relative to ./api directory)
# Empty lines and lines starting with # are ignored

chat.js
forms.js
analytics.js
files.js
vertex.js
vision.js

# Polar integration
polar/webhook.js
polar/create-checkout-session.js
polar/checkout-session.js
